entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
